name: qnorr-css
description: A style agnostic, slightly opinionated, css framework  seasoning to bootstrap your projects
author: Whitesmith <info@whitesmith.co>

scripts.dev: node-sass -w --output-style expanded --source-map true --source-map-contents true --precision 6 scss/qnorr.scss dist/qnorr.css
scripts.build: yarn run clean:dist && yarn run preprocess && yarn run postprocess
scripts.preprocess: node-sass --output-style expanded --source-map true --source-map-contents true --precision 6 scss/qnorr.scss dist/qnorr.css
